languages.text: Заполучив ручное божество, династия фон Валанциус стала доминирующей силой в Просторе. Конечно, весть об ужасном монстре, которым {name} фон Валанциус привел{mf||а} в трепет весь сектор, рано или поздно достигла бы Империума и привела к карательному походу, но... Вольному Торговцу было отпущено немало времени на подготовку.

Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.
languages.original_text: Заполучив ручное божество, династия фон Валанциус стала доминирующей силой в Просторе. Конечно, весть об ужасном монстре, которым {name} фон Валанциус привел{mf||а} в трепет весь сектор, рано или поздно достигла бы Империума и привела к карательному походу, но... Вольному Торговцу было отпущено немало времени на подготовку.

traits.locale_text: Having a tamed deity in its hands, the von Valancius dynasty became a dominant power in the Expanse. No doubt that the news of a horrible monster, which {name} von Valancius used to terrorise the entire sector, sooner or later should reach the Imperium, and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

Having a tamed deity in its hands, the von Valancius dynasty became a dominant power in the Expanse. No doubt that the news of a horrible monster, which {name} von Valancius used to terrorise the entire sector, sooner or later should reach the Imperium, and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

languages.text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝驯服了一位神明之后，立刻成为了科罗努斯扩区的主导势力。当然，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯利用可怕的怪物恐吓整个扩区的消息，迟早会传到帝国境内，还会引发一场惩戒性的远征，不过……行商浪人有充足的时间进行准备。
languages.original_text: Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

traits.locale_text: 冯·瓦兰修斯王朝驯服了一位神明之后，立刻成为了科罗努斯扩区的主导势力。当然，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯利用可怕的怪物恐吓整个扩区的消息，迟早会传到帝国境内，还会引发一场惩戒性的远征，不过……行商浪人有充足的时间进行准备。

languages.text: Nachdem die Dynastie derer von Valancius eine Gottheit gezähmt hatte, wurde sie zur vorherrschenden Macht in der Ausdehnung. Die Kunde von dem grauenhaften Monster, mit dem {name} von Valancius den gesamten Sektor terrorisierte, würde natürlich früher oder später das Imperium erreichen und eine Strafexpedition zur Folge haben, aber ... {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} blieb jede Menge Zeit, um sich darauf vorzubereiten.
languages.original_text: Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem die Dynastie derer von Valancius eine Gottheit gezähmt hatte, wurde sie zur vorherrschenden Macht in der Ausdehnung. Die Kunde von dem grauenhaften Monster, mit dem {name} von Valancius den gesamten Sektor terrorisierte, würde natürlich früher oder später das Imperium erreichen und eine Strafexpedition zur Folge haben, aber ... {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} blieb jede Menge Zeit, um sich darauf vorzubereiten.

languages.text: Après avoir dompté une divinité, la dynastie von Valancius prit le pouvoir dans l'ensemble des Étendues. Bien sûr, l'Imperium ne tarderait pas à apprendre que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius employait un horrible monstre pour asseoir son autorité dans le secteur et ne manquerait pas de lancer une expédition punitive, mais... {mf|il|elle} disposait de bien assez de temps pour s'y préparer.
languages.original_text: Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir dompté une divinité, la dynastie von Valancius prit le pouvoir dans l'ensemble des Étendues. Bien sûr, l'Imperium ne tarderait pas à apprendre que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} {name} von Valancius employait un horrible monstre pour asseoir son autorité dans le secteur et ne manquerait pas de lancer une expédition punitive, mais... {mf|il|elle} disposait de bien assez de temps pour s'y préparer.

languages.text: Tras domar a una deidad, la dinastía von Valancius se convirtió en el poder supremo de la Extensión. Por supuesto, las nuevas del horrible monstruo que {name} von Valancius utilizaba para aterrar a todo el sector acabarían por llegar al Imperium, que, tarde o temprano, enviaría una expedición de castigo, pero... {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tenía mucho tiempo para prepararse.
languages.original_text: Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

traits.locale_text: Tras domar a una deidad, la dinastía von Valancius se convirtió en el poder supremo de la Extensión. Por supuesto, las nuevas del horrible monstruo que {name} von Valancius utilizaba para aterrar a todo el sector acabarían por llegar al Imperium, que, tarde o temprano, enviaría una expedición de castigo, pero... {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente tenía mucho tiempo para prepararse.

languages.text: 神を懐柔したことで、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝はエクスパンスにおける最有力勢力となった。無論、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが恐ろしい怪物を使って全宙域を恐怖に陥れているという報せはほどなくして帝国のもとに届き、懲罰隊の遠征が組まれるのだろうが…自由開拓者には対策を講じる時間がたっぷりと残されていた。
languages.original_text: Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

traits.locale_text: 神を懐柔したことで、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝はエクスパンスにおける最有力勢力となった。無論、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスが恐ろしい怪物を使って全宙域を恐怖に陥れているという報せはほどなくして帝国のもとに届き、懲罰隊の遠征が組まれるのだろうが…自由開拓者には対策を講じる時間がたっぷりと残されていた。

languages.text: Bir ilahı ehlîleştiren von Valancius hanedanlığı, Enginlik'teki başlıca güç oldu. {name} von Valancius'un dehşet verici bir yaratık kullanarak sektörlerde terör estirdiği haberleri elbette ki er ya da geç İmparatorluk'a ulaşacak ve cezai bir seferi tetikleyecekti. O sırada Hür Tacir'in hazırlanmak için epey bir zamanı vardı.
languages.original_text: Having tamed a deity, the von Valancius dynasty became the dominant power in the Expanse. Of course, news of the horrible monster that {name} von Valancius was using to terrorise the entire sector would sooner or later reach the Imperium and prompt a punitive expedition, but... the Rogue Trader was given plenty of time to prepare.

traits.locale_text: Bir ilahı ehlileştirmiş olan von Valancius hanedanlığı, Enginlik'teki başlıca güç hâline geldi. {name} von Valancius'un dehşet verici bir yaratık kullanarak sektörlerde terör estirdiği haberleri elbette ki er ya da geç İmparatorluk'a ulaşacak ve cezai bir seferi tetikleyecekti ancak... Hür Tacir'in hazırlanmak için bol bol zamanı vardı.
